sentences: Neil Kevin Hennessy (born December 12, 1978) is a punk rock musician, music producer and engineer from Chicago, Illinois.
Hennessy currently plays in The Lawrence Arms, Colossal, The Falcon, The Smoking Popes, The Treasure Fleet and Demon Beach.
In late 2015, Hennessy took over rhythm guitar duties in fellow Chicago punk band Rise Against during their European tour.
Hennessy works at Atlas Studios in Chicago with Matt Allison.
Hennessy usually uses a Slingerland (1970s) drum kit, Zildjian cymbals, and Remo heads.
